name: Appraisal
description: Appraisal of discovery items can be made on collection of treasure reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Archaeology
description: Appraisal of discovery items can be made on collection of historical reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Art
description: Appraisal of discovery items can be made on collection of art reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Astronomy
description: Appraisal of Astronomy discoveries and gathering related information.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Biology
description: Appraisal of discovery items can be made on collection of biology reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Collection
description: A variety of materials and goods can be gathered.

name: Ecological Research
description: Discover flora and fauna in their natural habitat.
refined_effect: Increases experience and restores fatigue.

name: Eradication
description: Can ease damage from the likes of rats and seaweed.

name: Fishing
description: Fish can be caught.

name: Geography
description: Appraisal of a discovery item can be made on collection of geographical reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Haul
description: Sunken ships can be hauled without affecting sailing. Sailing Speed is increased when used together with hauling assistance.

name: Linguistics
description: Through the classification and analysis of many languages, you are able to write a dictionary.

name: Marching
description: Curb Fatigue and rate of bandit attack on land. Slightly reduce damage in sunken ship.

name: Mine Detection
description: Detect enemy laid sea mines during battle.

name: Navigation
description: Bring out the hidden performance in a particular vessel through a high level of skill in ship handling.

name: Observe
description: You can specify a place that seems to have something.

name: Persuasion
description: Talk to the girl at the bar about adventures and you can get friendly with her.

name: Pet Training
description: Draws out the special effects of pets. The effects drawn out will increase depending on Rank.

name: Procurement
description: Secure water when it rains and obtain food provisions on land.

name: Provisions
description: Cheap purchase of Water, Food, Timber and Munitions at Port.

name: Recognition
description: Can be used to discover Sea Regions, Ruins, Astronomical Objects, and search for flotsam.
refined_effect: Increases experience and restores fatigue.

name: Rescue
description: Can rescue a Fleet Member that cannot sail or Sailors that have fallen overboard.
refined_effect: Increases the effectiveness of the Rescue skill during sea battle.

name: Sail Handling
description: Increases the sailing speed of the ship. The effect increases according to Rank.
refined_effect: Extends the range that can be reached at with Auto Navigation.

name: Salvage
description: You can raise sleeping, sunken hulks from the bottom of the sea.
refined_effect: When salvaging shipwrecks, the success rate of salvage increases, and damage to the crew and hull is reduced.

name: Search
description: With correct location and excavation, all treasures can be found.
refined_effect: Increases experience and restores fatigue.

name: Surveying
description: Survey the surroundings and define present location.
refined_effect: When using the Observe Skill or a Treasure Map, the discovery detection range is increased.

name: Survival
description: Lessen harm to crew in times of drought and hunger, storm and blizzard.

name: Theology
description: Appraisal of discovery items can be made on collection of religious reports.
refined_effect: Increase in fame and experience. Also, reduced headaches at the archives meaning you can browse for longer.

name: Throwing
description: The attack power and attack speed of throwing weapons in land battles are raised.

name: Trap
description: Discover/Disarm traps set in dungeon Increase effectiveness of Trap-type techs.
refined_effect: Trap Techs have a larger range and effect.

name: Unlock
description: The locks and traps for finding discovery items can be released.
refined_effect: Opening chests in a dungeon gains more loot.

name: Violin Performance
description: Play the violin to relieve sailors of Fatigue, stress, and homesickness. Repel sirens.

name: Wining and Dining
description: Treating the crew to alcoholic trade goods relieves their Fatigue.

name: Accounts
description: You will be able to negotiate prices and see the nearby towns' market rates.
refined_effect: Better success through haggling.

name: Alchemy
description: A chemical technique of refining materials to turn them into gold.

name: Alcohol Trading
description: More alcohol can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Art Trading
description: More artwork can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Body Language
description: You can converse with people on the street without knowing their language.
refined_effect: Once body language is successful once in a city, it is always successful while in that city.

name: Casting
description: Tradable industrial products can be manufactured into weapons.
refined_effect: Chance to Consume fewer materials and higher chance of great successes.

name: Caution
description: To guard against enemy at sea and not fall for an Ambush.

name: Cooking
description: Groceries can be made into dishes.
refined_effect: Chance to Consume fewer materials and higher chance of great successes.

name: Crafts Trading
description: More crafts can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Dye Trading
description: More dye can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Escape
description: Stop fighting during a sea battle and flee at full speed.

name: Fabric Trading
description: More fabric can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Firearms Trading
description: More firearms can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Food Trading
description: More provisions can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Frugality
description: Reduces the consumption of Water and Food provided to Sailors as well as the cost of hiring Sailors.

name: Handicrafts
description: Tradable material such as wood can be fashioned into another tradable item such as a work of art.
refined_effect: Chance to Consume fewer materials and higher chance of great successes.

name: Jewellry Trading
description: More precious stones can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Livestock Trading
description: More domestic livestock can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Luxuries Trading
description: More luxuries can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Management Skill
description: High level methods of management bring about the effective use of equipment on special vessels.

name: Medicine Trading
description: More medicine can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Merchandise Knowledge
description: Utilize vast and deep knowledge of Merchandise and increase effectiveness of Item-type Techs.

name: Metal Trading
description: More precious metals can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Mineral Trading
description: More mineral ore can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Perfume Trading
description: More fragrance can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Seasoning Trading
description: More seasonings can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Sewing
description: Tradable ingredients can be made into clothing.
refined_effect: Chance to Consume fewer materials and higher chance of great successes.

name: Sociability
description: Talking with people holding high positions becomes easier. Reduce the chance of failure in price negotiations.

name: Spice Trading
description: More seasonings can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Storage
description: In case of shipwreck or being looted, damage can be somewhat eased. Preserved food can be made.
refined_effect: Chance to Consume fewer materials and higher chance of great successes.

name: Sundries Trading
description: More miscellaneous goods can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Textile Trading
description: More fibre can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Wares Trading
description: More wares can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Weapons Trading
description: More weapons can be bought at the market.
refined_effect: Able to use 100 vigour once per visit instead of a Purchase Order. Repeated purchases of goods won't decrease the available amount as much.

name: Aboardage
description: Easier to engage in Melee Battle.

name: Accuracy
description: Cannons, autocannons and flamethrowers can hit targets more easily. Also, they can shoot at close range.
refined_effect: Increases the cannonspeed after being fired.

name: Arms
description: Thanks to good knowledge of weapons, you are able to operate powerful equipment on special ships.

name: Assault
description: Temporary increase in Attack Power during Melee Battle.
refined_effect: When using it, 33 %(approx) chance that it will act as an Obstruction (preventing item use by enemy) during melee battle. NOTE: If the effect applies, assault skill itself won't bring extra kills towards enemy crew.

name: Ballistics
description: Extends cannon firing range.
refined_effect: The cannonfire range is further increased.

name: Bow Attack
description: Increases the Critical rate when using a bow or crossbow in Land Battle.

name: Evasion
description: Makes it difficult for enemy bombs to strike during battle.

name: Fire Fighting
description: Extinguish fire at sea.
refined_effect: When using it, it repairs your ship durability.

name: First Aid
description: Lowers the loss of crew due to injury during battle or exploration.

name: Guard
description: Temporary increase in Defence Power during Melee Battle.
refined_effect: When using it, chance that the vigour of your opponent will be reduced during melee battle.

name: Gunfire
description: Decrease the opponent's attack and defense power during Melee Battles. And increase the attack speed of guns and handguns in Land Battles.
refined_effect: When using it, 33 %(approx) chance that it will act as an Obstruction (preventing item use by enemy) during melee battle. NOTE: If the effect applies, gunfire won't reduce the melee stats of your enemy at all.

name: Gunnery
description: Cannon loads become quicker, and cannons, autocanons and flamethrowers less prone to break down.
refined_effect: Reduces the vigour cost of all cannonskills by 10 %.

name: Leadership
description: Alleviation of issues with the crew such as disorder, fighting, and mutiny.

name: Lookout
description: You are able to know the name of the captain of a far off ship.

name: Mine Laying
description: Ability to lay sea mines during battle.

name: Pathology
description: Medical treatment for outbreaks of scurvy or infectious disease at sea.

name: Penetration
description: Increases destructive capability of cannon.
refined_effect: When in use, chance of causing abnormality (disorder, leaks etc..) is raised.

name: Plunder
description: After victory in hand to hand combat or a land battle, plunder your enemy's possessions.
refined_effect: Increase item plunder chances. Increases the chance of successful item plunder.

name: Reloading
description: Temporary increase in speed of cannon loads.
refined_effect: The loading speed increases further.

name: Repair
description: Timber can be used to repair ships.

name: Request Convoy
description: Support from your country's navy is called. Cannot be used for personal disputes.

name: Request Reinforce
description: Call for reinforcements from another fleet.

name: Rowing
description: Increases speed of vessels fitted with oars.
refined_effect: The acceleration and shipspeed are raised (approx. 5 %). Also the penalty of turning is eased when using it.

name: Shipbuilding
description: Ships can be built at the Shipyard.

name: Sniping
description: Increases the attack power and attack speed of long-range weapons.

name: Steering
description: Increases ship Turning Speed. Also lessens damage from sea mines, etc.
refined_effect: Enhances the effectiveness of Cannon Evade from Figureheads and damage taken by rams is reduced.

name: Surgery
description: Medical treatment for crew injured in battle. Water is required.

name: Sword Mastery
description: The attack power and attack speed of close-range weapons in land battles are raised.

name: Swordplay
description: The attack power in melee battles and the attack power of close-range weapons in land battles is raised.
refined_effect: Reduces the vigour cost of melee skills by 10 %.

name: Tactics
description: Can increase Attack and Defence Power during Melee Battle.
refined_effect: When using it, chance that the vigour of your opponent will be reduced during melee battle.

name: Ancient Egyptian
description: Ability to read books. Used for ancient texts in Egypt.

name: Arabic
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Islamic lands.

name: Celtic
description: Ability to read books. Used for ancient texts on the island of Britain.

name: Chinese
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used all across China.

name: Dutch
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used near Northern Flanders.

name: English
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in the vicinity of Britain.

name: Far North Languages
description: Browsing books and conversing becomes possible in Russia and the Far North.

name: French
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used near France.

name: German
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Germany.

name: Greek
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in the Balkan Peninsula.

name: Hebrew
description: Ability to read books. Used for ancient texts in the Sinai peninsula.

name: Indian Languages
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used all across India.

name: Italian
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used near Italy.

name: Japanese
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Japan.

name: Korean
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used all across Korean Peninsula.

name: Latin
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used by European scholars.

name: Malay/Tagalog
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in the south-east region of South-east Asia.

name: Mayan Languages
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Central America.

name: Mon-Khmer lang.
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Indo-China.

name: Nahuatl
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in part of Central America.

name: Nordic
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Scandinavia.

name: North American Languages
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in the vicinity of North America.

name: Oceanic Languages
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Oceania.

name: Persian
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Hormuz and Basra.

name: Portuguese
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used near Iberia.

name: Quechuan
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in part of the South American continent.

name: Slavic
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in Eastern Europe.

name: Spanish
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used near Iberia.

name: Swahili
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in East Africa.

name: Thai/Burmese
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used mainly in the Malay peninsula.

name: Turkish
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used around Turkey.

name: West African Languages
description: Ability to converse and read books. Used in the south-west of Africa.
